nodes.text: The Nebula Assassin is a web adventure published by Wizards of the Coast for Tempest Feud. It was written by Owen K.C. Stephens and published on March 7, 2002.

The Nebula Assassin is a mini-adventure for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game suitable for use during any era of play. The scenario, which is designed for four 10th-level heroes, takes place on the Lost Lady, an old space barge that makes trips between the Hutt world of Nal Hutta and its satellite Nar Shaddaa (also known as the Smuggler's Moon).
